modName: modified dragons reach home and armory
summary: Just a modified dragons reach to be a home with a large armory.
descriptionHtml:
Introduction :

This is  my first mod so please be gentle.

So i was looking for a simple player home with lots of mannequins / display cases and nothing to busy but couldn\'t find anything to my liking.

There\'s many player homes that have a armory as part of it but it\'s usually a giant beautiful home that will take up more performance that it should.
So i made my own.


Description :

It\'s basically a stripped version of the interior cell from dragon\'s reach with just the main room and all the other rooms removed.

It\'s well lit and the interior has been changed a bit.

It has :
14 mannequins
15 display cases
8 weapon rack\'s
3 large chests
1x enchanting table
1x alchemy table
1x forge
1x smelter
1x tanning rack
1x armor workbench
1x sharpening wheel

It\'s also follower friendly.

It should show up on your map as soon as the mod is activated and u can fast travel from within the house.


Installation :

Simply extract the archive and put the esp file in your data folder, then activate it through the Skyrim Launcher / Nexus Mod Manager / Mod Organizer / etc.


Known Issue\'s :

1. Sometimes when u look up it seems like the roof pieces aren\'t properly aligned and there\'s a tiny space in between them.

In the creation kit these are perfectly aligned so i have no idea how to fix this.

2. The weapon racks.

I\'ve spent roughly 2 hours fiddling with the weapon racks, at first they didn\'t work at all so i took them from a existing player home... those didn\'t work as well so i scrapped them and tried them again and now they seem to work though big axes will still bug now and then.

No idea how to fix this.


Final words :

It\'s my first mod, it\'s not much but it\'s functional.

If anybody installs this and run\'s in to an issue let me know and i will see if i can fix it, suggestions are of course welcome.

-Anubis
author: Anubis
